title: Phase 1: Project Setup + Research Organization (Week 1)
description: Set up directory structure, organize research findings from planning phase, create skeleton files, establish monthly update workflow documentation

title: Phase 2: Core Content Development (Weeks 2-3)
description: Draft Executive Summary, The Challenge section, Understanding Spec-Driven Development section. Focus on evidence-based writing with technical depth for VP Eng/CTO audience

title: Phase 3: Technical Deep-Dives + Tool Analysis (Week 4)
description: Complete Evidence Base section, Tools Landscape analysis with comparison matrix, technical architecture diagrams, DORA + SPACE metrics framework

title: Phase 5: Review, Polish, Monthly Update Workflow (Week 6)
description: Final review for technical accuracy, establish monthly update process documentation, create client conversation guide, version 1.0 release preparation

title: Phase 4: Nagarro Positioning + Action Framework (Week 5)
description: Write Nagarro's Approach section integrating Fluidic Intelligence, create Implementation Framework, develop client-facing Action Framework and conversation starters
